description: Some gems have hidden qualities beyond their luster, beyond their shine... Azurite is one of those gems.
name: Azurite

description: Origin of the Bloodstone is unknown, hence its low value. It has a very high shine and 12 sides, however.
name: Bloodstone

reviews.author: JimmyDean@example.org
reviews.body: I think this gem was just OK, could honestly use more shine, IMO.

reviews.author: gemsRock@example.org
reviews.body: Any gem with 12 faces is for me!

description: Zircon is our most coveted and sought after gem. You will pay much to be the proud owner of this gorgeous and high shine gem.
name: Zircon

reviews.author: turtleguyy@example.org
reviews.body: This gem is WAY too expensive for its rarity value.
